ISSUE.TITLE: DeleteShoppingCartItemAsync & AddToCartAsync optimization
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: All Steps to reproduce the problem: DeleteShoppingCartItemAsync and AddToCartAsync methods has this code: **customer.HasShoppingCartItems = !IsCustomerShoppingCartEmpty(customer); await _customerService.UpdateCustomerAsync(customer);** No need to call UpdateCustomer everytime and hit the database, we can optimize it as follwoing **var hasShoppingCartItems = !IsCustomerShoppingCartEmpty(customer); if (hasShoppingCartItems != customer.HasShoppingCartItems) { customer.HasShoppingCartItems = hasShoppingCartItems; await _customerService.UpdateCustomerAsync(customer); }**
